compounddef.innerclass: detail::detector< Default, void_t< Op< Args... > >, Op, Args... >

memberdef.name: BOOST_STATIC_VIEWS_DEFINE_CHECK
memberdef.initializer: struct name { \ template <class T> \ static constexpr auto test() noexcept -> bool \ { \ return expr; \ } \ \ template <class T> \ static constexpr auto check() noexcept -> bool \ { \ constexpr bool x = test<T>(); \ static_assert(x, msg); \ return x; \ } \ }
